tool_description: Analyzes demographic trends over time to predict audience composition changes and identify emerging market segments for strategic planning.

time_periods.description: Time period labels corresponding to demographic data

demographic_category.description: Category being analyzed (age, income, education, cultural)

forecast_months.description: Number of months to forecast ahead (1-12)

error_messages: Mismatched data arrays: venue_demographics and time_periods arrays must have the same length.
Insufficient data points: At least 10 historical data points are required for trend analysis.
Invalid demographic category: Must be one of 'age', 'income', 'education', or 'cultural'.
Invalid forecast period: forecast_months must be between 1 and 12.
Data quality issues: Historical data contains invalid or inconsistent values.
usage: Provide historical demographic data with corresponding time periods and specify the demographic category to analyze trends and generate forecasts.

trend_direction.description: Overall trend direction (increasing, decreasing, stable, volatile)

forecasted_values.description: Predicted values for the forecast period

strategic_recommendations.description: Recommended strategic adjustments based on trends
